title: President urges youth to learn modern tech skills like AI, robotics
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 08 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Wednesday urged the students to learn the modern technology skills including artificial intelligence, robotics and others.
The president, in an interaction with a delegation of students from Cadet College Kohat, said the students should also adopt the values like honesty and morality.
Besides, they should also inculcate in them the passion to serve and sympathise with the downtrodden people of the society.
The president said that the national leadership would have to take urgent and timely decisions to steer the country out of economic crisis. An honest leadership was inevitable to put the country on course of progress, he added.
He said the enrollment of around 20 million out-of-school children was essential as the primary level enrollment in the country stood at 68% contrary to 98% in other countries
